name: API call for Namespaces list
Overall framesets
template:
<frameset rows="50px,*"> 
    <frame noresize src="/selectOCPProject" marginheight="9"> 
    <frameset cols="20%,80%"> 
        <frame src="/selectOCPObject" name="OCPObjectFrame" id="OCPObjectFrame" frameborder="1"> 
        <frame src="/selectFirstScreen" name="OCPObjectActionFrame" id="OCPObjectActionFrame" frameborder="1"> 
        <!--<frame src="/ocpObjectResults" name="OCPObjectResultsFrame" id="OCPObjectResultsFrame" frameborder="1"> -->
    </frameset> 
</frameset>

<iframe id="invisible" name="invisible" style="display:none;"></iframe>
<form method="GET" target="invisible" name="frmExport" id="frmExport">
<input type="hidden" name="selSecret" id="selSecret" value="ALL">    
<input type="hidden" name="selConfigMap" id="selConfigMap" value="ALL">    
<input type="hidden" name="selPV" id="selPV" value="ALL">    
<input type="hidden" name="selPVC" id="selPVC" value="ALL">    
<input type="hidden" name="selDeployment" id="selDeployment" value="ALL">    
<input type="hidden" name="selStatefulSet" id="selStatefulSet" value="ALL">    
<input type="hidden" name="selService" id="selService" value="ALL">    
<input type="hidden" name="selJob" id="selJob" value="ALL">    
<input type="hidden" name="selCronJob" id="selCronJob" value="ALL">    

Select OCP project: <select name="selProject" id="selProject" onload="localStorage.setItem('selProject', document.all.selProject.value);" onchange="JavaScript:setProject();">
{{#payload}}
<option>{{metadata.name}}</option>
{{/payload}}
</select>

</form>

<script language="JavaScript">
function setProject(){
    localStorage.setItem('selProject', document.all.frmExport.selProject.value);
    document.all.frmExport.action="{{{global.urlPrefix}}}/setProject";
    document.all.frmExport.submit();
}
document.all.frmExport.selProject.value='{{{global.selProject}}}';
</script>

{{#payload}} {{/payload}}
{{name}}

This Clone/Reinstate service allows the end users to:

  1. Extract K8S object metadata
  2. Clone/reinstate selected objects and/or data



There are 3 screens including:

  • Configure: Configuration parameters to customize the clone/reinstate service
  • Explore: Select K8S Object type from the left menu, see a list of instances for selected K8S object type and generate the specs either individually or for all items of selected type
  • Clone/Reinstate: Select "Clone source metadata" to extract specs for all K8s object required for your application (Ex: CP4D), "Clone data - Source" to clone data in parallel from source PVCs to target PVC, "Reinstate data - Target" to reinstate data in parallel from cloned target PVC to application PVC

template:
Readme

  • Configure kube config to connect to OCP cluster (currently done by navigating to the node-red flow but will be programmatically controlled soon)
  • Setup global configuration parameters
  • Select K8s object type from the left and explore available instances in the connected OCP cluster.

Global configuration parameters (with suggested default values)

selProjectcp4d
yamlSaveLocation/usr/src/node-red/CloneYAMLFiles
scriptsLocation/tmp
urlPrefixhttp://localhost:1880
restoreImageRegistryNOT_USED_CURRENTLY
